g.text: Adds an alarm to the client device
[Result of adding an alarm == Failed to add]
Sends the result of adding an alarm
Sends the Actiontimer, Alarm, Reminder, and Timer templates
Outputs a voice and displays the added alarm details
Sends the result of adding an alarm
include activateAlerts as a required field in Alert.AlertsState)
Requests to stop the alarm (using an utterance or physical button)
[Type of stop alarm request == User utterance]
Sends a request to stop the alarm
[Type of stop alarm request == Physical button]
Sends a request to stop the alarm
Sends the directive to perform the user-scheduled action
